definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
surname Yao/Yao or Tang Yao (c. 2200 BC), one of Five legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4], second son of Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
to pour oil on the fire (idiom); fig. to aggravate a situation/to enrage people and make matters worse
to pour cold water/fig. to discourage
to water the plants/to water the garden

sentences.english: Heat the oil in a large, heavy soup pot or Dutch oven over medium heat, and add the onion.
sentences.chinese: 往一个大汤壶或荷兰烤肉锅中浇上油，热锅后加洋葱。

sentences.english: They irrigated their crops with water from this river .
sentences.chinese: 他们用这条小河里的水浇庄稼。

sentences.english: Drunk will feed a small sugar taro, sprinkle with laurel pulp, beauty is not to say.
sentences.chinese: 酒后必食一小糖芋头，浇以桂浆，美不待言。

sentences.english: She poured water over my painting and ruined it.
sentences.chinese: 她把水浇在我的画上，将画毁掉了。

sentences.english: Yet can not stop the fire of love from me to you.
sentences.chinese: 也浇不熄我对你爱情的火焰。

sentences.english: Stir in basil. Spoon curry over rice. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 拌入罗勒叶，把咖喱浇在饭上即可。

sentences.english: Having watered the vegetables, they began to pick up the apples.
sentences.chinese: 他们浇完了蔬菜之后，就开始摘苹果。

sentences.english: To top off this delectable dish, serve a Two-Potato Salad With Mustard-Chive Dressing.
sentences.chinese: 搭配这款美食，需要浇了芥末撒了小香葱的红薯沙拉。

sentences.english: They crowd round the tap and splash water over their faces .
sentences.chinese: 自来水龙头边挤满了人，用手捧些水来浇在脸上。

sentences.english: Get some water from the well , and water the flowers well .
sentences.chinese: 从井里打些水把花好好地浇一浇。

sentences.english: Get some water from the well , and water the flowers well .
sentences.chinese: 从井里打些水把花好好地浇一浇。

sentences.english: Having watered the vegetables, they began to pick the apples.
sentences.chinese: 他们浇完了蔬菜之后就开始摘苹果。

sentences.english: Small flat belt person constantly poured gasoline, He Junfeng before stop quickly.
sentences.chinese: 小平头带人在不停的浇汽油，贺俊峰见状赶紧阻止。

sentences.english: They put out the fire by pouring water on it.
sentences.chinese: 他们在火上浇了水，把它扑灭了。

sentences.english: Based on the large orifice discharge theory, the kiss gating system of the casting was designed.
sentences.chinese: 运用大孔出流理论设计了顶注压边浇冒口系统。

sentences.english: Shaonei plus soup thicken pour out the oil poured on the squid.
sentences.chinese: 勺内加原汤勾芡淋明油浇在乌贼上。

definition: cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
to pour cold water/fig. to discourage
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
